## StateMachine.provide() method

Clones this state machine with the provided implementations and merges the `context` (if provided).

**Signature:**

```typescript
provide(implementations: InternalMachineImplementations<TContext, TEvent, TActor, TAction, TDelay, TResolvedTypesMeta, true>): StateMachine<TContext, TEvent, TActor, TAction, TGuard, TDelay, TTag, TInput, TOutput, AreAllImplementationsAssumedToBeProvided<TResolvedTypesMeta> extends false ? MarkAllImplementationsAsProvided<TResolvedTypesMeta> : TResolvedTypesMeta>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  implementations | [InternalMachineImplementations](./xstate.internalmachineimplementations.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, TActor, TAction, TDelay, TResolvedTypesMeta, true&gt; | Options (<code>actions</code>, <code>guards</code>, <code>actors</code>, <code>delays</code>, <code>context</code>) to recursively merge with the existing options. |

**Returns:**

[StateMachine](./xstate.statemachine.md)<></>&lt;TContext, TEvent, TActor, TAction, TGuard, TDelay, TTag, TInput, TOutput, [AreAllImplementationsAssumedToBeProvided](./xstate.areallimplementationsassumedtobeprovided.md)<></>&lt;TResolvedTypesMeta&gt; extends false ? [MarkAllImplementationsAsProvided](./xstate.markallimplementationsasprovided.md)<></>&lt;TResolvedTypesMeta&gt; : TResolvedTypesMeta&gt;

A new `StateMachine` instance with the provided implementations.
